title: Temple Hoyne Buell and National Kidney Foundation Endowed Chair
description: To provide salary for a named professor, to provide for an annual lectureship and seminars and to support research in kidney diseases at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide salary for a named professor, to provide for an annual lectureship and seminars and to support research in kidney diseases at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
